passages.title: Title of Your Passage
passages.text:
First paragraph of your passage goes here. Keep it clear and appropriate for the grade level.

Second paragraph continues the content. Passages are typically 2-3 paragraphs for elementary, and can be longer for high school.

Third paragraph (optional) can provide additional context or conclusion.

questions.questionText: Your question text goes here. Make it clear and specific.
questions.explanation: Explain why B is correct and reference specific evidence or reasoning.

questions.questionText: Question about the passage above. Reference specific details from the text.
questions.explanation: Explain why C is correct by citing specific evidence from the passage.
